interfaces.UI package¶

Submodules¶

interfaces.UI.molSim_ui_main module¶

User Interface and associated methods to access the key functionalities of molSim without having to use the command line.

Raises:

IOError: When pressing ‘open config’ it is possible that no suitable program will be known to the OS to open .yaml files. Also if no tasks are selected, an IOError will be raised.

Author:

Jackson Burns

class interfaces.UI.molSim_ui_main.MolsimUiApp(master=None)¶

Bases: object

User interface to access key functionalities of molSim.

openConfigCallback()¶

Open the config file being used by the UI to allow the user to edit it.

run()¶

Start the UI.

runCallback()¶

Retrieves user input, writes to a .yaml configuration file, and calls molSim on that input.

Raises:

IOError: When opening the automatically generated config file from the UI, there is a chance that the OS will not know which program to use, raising the error.

interfaces.UI.molSim_ui_main.main()¶

Start the app.
